mapper.insert: insert into company(cSerial, cNum, cCeo, cName, cPeople, cCreated, cSize, cTel, cProfit, cIntro, mId, subCode, cDescription, cAddress) values(#{cSerial}, com_seq.nextval, #{cCeo}, #{cName}, #{cPeople}, #{cCreated}, #{cSize}, #{cTel}, #{cProfit}, #{cIntro}, #{mId}, #{subCode}, #{cDescription}, #{cAddress})

insert into com_image(ciNum, cLogoImage, cLogoOriginalFilename, cCoverImage, cCoverOriginalFilename, cSerial) values(com_image_seq.nextval, #{cLogoImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cLogoOriginalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCoverImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCoverOriginalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSerial})
mapper.select:
select nvl(count(*), 0) from company c join sub_bu_class sb on c.subCode=sb.subCode join main_bu_class mb on sb.maCode=mb.maCode
and cNum>0

select c.cSerial, mId, cNum, cCeo, cName, cPeople, to_char(cCreated, 'YYYY-MM-DD') cCreated, cSize, cTel, cProfit, cIntro, cAddress, sb.subName, mb.maName, ci.cLogoImage, ci.cCoverImage from company c join sub_bu_class sb on c.subCode=sb.subCode join main_bu_class mb on sb.maCode=mb.maCode join com_image ci on c.cSerial=ci.cSerial where cNum=#{cNum}

select c.cSerial, mId, cNum, cCeo, cName, cPeople, to_char(cCreated, 'YYYY-MM-DD') cCreated, cSize, cTel, cProfit, cIntro, cDescription, cAddress, c.subCode, sb.subName, mb.maName, ci.cLogoImage, ci.cCoverImage, ci.cLogoOriginalFilename, ci.cCoverOriginalFilename from company c join sub_bu_class sb on c.subCode=sb.subCode join main_bu_class mb on sb.maCode=mb.maCode join com_image ci on c.cSerial=ci.cSerial where c.cSerial=#{cSerial}
mapper.insert: insert into com_employ(ceNum, ceSubject, cePeople, ceType, ceStart, ceEnd, cePay, cePlace, cePrefere, ceEtc, resumeForm, resumeFile, resumeOriginalName, cSerial, atCode, subCode) values(com_employ_seq.nextval, #{ceSubject}, #{cePeople}, #{ceType}, #{ceStart}, #{ceEnd}, #{cePay}, #{cePlace}, #{cePrefere}, #{ceEtc}, #{resumeForm}, #{resumeFile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resumeOriginalName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSerial}, #{atCode}, #{subCode})
mapper.select: select ceNum, ceSubject, cePeople, ceType, to_char(ceStart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ceStart, to_char(ceEnd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ceEnd, cePay, cePrefere, ceEtc, resumeForm, ce.cSerial, atCode, ce.subCode, maCode, cePlace, cName, resumeFile, resumeOriginalName from com_employ ce join sub_class sc on ce.subCode=sc.subCode join company c on ce.cSerial=c.cSerial where ceNum=#{ceNum}
mapper.update: update com_employ set ceSubject=#{ceSubject}, cePeople=#{cePeople}, ceType=#{ceType}, ceStart=#{ceStart}, ceEnd=#{ceEnd}, cePay=#{cePay}, cePlace=#{cePlace}, cePrefere=#{cePrefere}, ceEtc=#{ceEtc}, resumeForm=#{resumeForm}, resumeFile=#{resumeFile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resumeOriginalName=#{resumeOriginalName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, atCode=#{atCode}, subCode=#{subCode} where ceNum=#{ceNum}
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from applicant where ceNum=#{ceNum}

select cNum, cName from company where cNum>0
and instr(cName, #{searchCompany})>=1
select cName from company where cNum=#{cNum}
mapper.insert: insert into company_qu(cqNum, cqSubject, cqContent, cqIsq, cqDepth, cqGroupNum, mId, cNum) values(COMPANY_QU_SEQ.CURRVAL, #{cqSubject}, #{cqContent}, 0, 0, COMPANY_QU_SEQ.nextval, #{mId}, #{cNum})
insert into company_qu(cqNum, cqSubject, cqContent, cqIsq, cqDepth, cqGroupNum, mId, cNum) values(company_qu_seq.nextval, #{cqSubject}, #{cqContent}, 1, 1, #{cqNum}, #{mId}, #{cNum})
mapper.select: select cqNum, cqSubject, cqContent, to_char(cqCreated, 'YYYY-MM-DD') cqCreated, cqIsq, cqDepth, cqGroupNum, cq.mId, cNum, mName from company_qu cq join member m on cq.mId=m.mId where cqNum=#{cqNum}
mapper.update: update company_qu set cqIsq=1 where cqNum=#{cqNum}
update company_qu set cqIsq=0 where cqNum=#{cqNum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from company_qu where cqGroupNum=#{cqGroupNum} and cqDepth=1
mapper.update: update company_qu set cqSubject=#{cqSubject}, cqContent=#{cqContent} where cqNum=#{cqNum}
mapper.select:
select * from( select rownum rnum, tb.* from( select distinct c.cSerial, c.mId, cNum, cName, mName, cDescription, sb.subName, mb.maName, ci.cLogoImage, ci.cCoverImage, nvl(count(ce.cSerial) over(partition by c.cSerial), 0) employ_cnt, proPhoto from company c join sub_bu_class sb on c.subCode=sb.subCode join main_bu_class mb on sb.maCode=mb.maCode join com_image ci on c.cSerial=ci.cSerial join member m on c.mId=m.mId left outer join profile p on c.mId=p.mId left outer join com_employ ce on c.cSerial=ce.cSerial where cNum>0 order by employ_cnt desc, c.cNum asc
)tb where rownum<=3 )where rnum>=1
mapper.insert: insert into gov_news(gnNum, gnSubject, gnContent, mId) values(gov_news_seq.nextval, #{gnSubject}, #{gnContent}, #{mId})
mapper.select: select count(*) from gov_news gn join member m on gn.mId=m.mId
mapper.update: update gov_news set gnHitCount=gnHitCount+1 where gnNum=#{gnNum}
mapper.select: select gnNum, gnSubject, gnContent, gnHitCount, gnCreated, gn.mId, mName from gov_news gn join member m on gn.mId=m.mId where gnNum=#{gnNum}

select tb.* from( select gnNum, gnSubject from gov_news gn join member m on gn.mId=m.mId
and (gnNum>#{gnNum})
order by gnNum asc )tb where rownum=1

select tb.* from( select gnNum, gnSubject from gov_news gn join member m on gn.mId=m.mId
and (gnNum<#{gnNum})
order by gnNum desc )tb where rownum=1
